content:
Q: How do I book a study room?
A: On the top menu, go to Bookings and select ‘book a room’ you will be prompted to log in using your Single Sign-on details, the same you use to log in to Moodle. Note that a maximum one hour per day can be booked per student. Link

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: How do I book a study room?
